item.title: 墨西哥石油出口跌至谷底，产量降至 46 年最低点
item.description: 墨西哥的石油产量正急剧下降到上世纪 70 年代末巨大的坎塔雷尔油田开工前的水平，在美国炼油商最需要墨西哥石油的时候，墨西哥的石油产量对美国炼油商构成了威胁。【原文：Mexican oil production is on track to plummet to levels last seen in the late 1970s before the start of the giant Cantarell field, posing a threat to US refiners at a time when they need oil from the country the most.】

item.title: X 将部署人工智能撰写社区说明，扩大事实核查范围
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司将开始发布由人工智能代理撰写的 "社区笔记"，此举旨在提高社交网络事实核查产品的速度，并将其推广到更多人。【原文：Elon Musk’s X will start to publish Community Notes written by artificial intelligence agents, a move to increase the speed of the social network’s fact-checking product and expand it to reach more people.】

item.title: 季度末的波动预示着融资市场的失调即将到来
item.description: 本季度末，美国融资市场利率飙升，表明随着国会取消债务上限，货币市场可能会进一步混乱。【原文：Rates in the US funding market surged at the end of the quarter in a sign of potentially further dislocations in money markets as Congress lifts the debt ceiling.】

item.title: 交易员对错失股票涨幅的担忧超过了对关税的担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税暂停政策将于 7 月 9 日结束，目前已锁定的协议寥寥无几，谈判也进展甚微。然而，曾经因贸易头条新闻而大幅波动的股市似乎看不到什么风险，因为股票指数已接近历史高点，波动性已经消失。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff pause is set to end on July 9, with few deals locked in and scant progress in negotiations. Yet the stock market that once swung wildly on trade headlines appears to see little risk, as equity indexes sit near all-time highs and volatility evaporates.】

item.title: 参议院税收新法案为 "太空债券 "市场做好准备
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的税收和支出法案周二在参议院获得通过，其中包含了一项新的融资工具，市政债券市场有望走向无限大，甚至更大。【原文：The municipal-bond market is poised to go to infinity — and beyond — with a new financing tool included in President Donald Trump’s tax and spending bill that passed the Senate Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通加剧主动型基金竞争，先锋计划推出首只垃圾股 ETF
item.description: 先锋集团（Vanguard Group）正计划进军竞争日益激烈的美国 11.6 万亿美元交易所交易基金领域。【原文：Vanguard Group is planning its debut into an increasingly competitive corner of the $11.6 trillion US exchange-traded fund arena.】

item.title: 莫迪访问加纳，加纳将寻求印度支持建立疫苗中心
item.description: 加纳计划在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪本周访问这个西非国家时请求印度支持发展疫苗中心。【原文：Ghana plans to ask India for support to develop a vaccine hub when Prime Minister Narendra Modi visits the West African nation this week.】

item.title: 美国银行客户以 10 周来最快速度抛售股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的客户以 10 周以来最快的速度从美国股票市场撤资，减少了在美国 500 指数（S&P 500）创下 2023 年以来最佳季度的风险敞口。【原文：Bank of America Corp. clients withdrew money from US equities at the fastest pace in 10 weeks, reducing exposure as the S&P 500 capped its best quarter since 2023 to end June at a record.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学申请人个人数据遭黑客窃取
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）对一名自称在 6 月份入侵该校的人提供的数据进行的审查显示，哥伦比亚大学学生和申请者的个人信息（包括是否被该校录取）已被窃取。【原文：Personal information about Columbia University students and applicants — including whether they were accepted or rejected by the school — has been stolen, according to a Bloomberg News review of data provided by a person who claimed to have hacked the school in June.】

item.title: 智利锂矿扩建项目获得鲜为人知的核机构批准
item.description: 一个鲜为人知的核机构签署了一项提案，为智利这个拥有最大锂储量的国家在未来几十年内大规模扩产锂扫清了道路。【原文：A little-known nuclear agency signed off on a proposal that clears the way for a major lithium expansion over the coming decades in Chile, the nation with the biggest reserves.】

item.title: 硬件初创公司 "Nothing "发布最前卫的智能手机
item.description:
这家拥有五年历史的公司以其大胆的设计而闻名，它发布了 Phone 3 and a pair of similarly quirky headphones.【原文：

The five-year-old company, known for its bold designs, unveiled the Phone 3 and a pair of similarly quirky headphones.

】

item.title: 斯塔默放弃大部分福利改革以避免工党反叛
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在他的大部分福利改革措施上出尔反尔，以避免可能给英国首相带来首次失败的破坏性反叛。【原文：Keir Starmer backtracked on most of his welfare reforms in a bid to avoid a damaging rebellion that threatened to inflict a first defeat on the UK prime minister.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒认为目前无需降息刺激经济
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，目前的经济并不支持刺激经济增长的利率，因此官员们可以暂停宽松政策，以评估经济活动如何抵御各种威胁。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller said the economy doesn’t currently justify interest rates that stimulate growth, allowing officials to take a pause from easing to gauge how activity withstands various threats.】

item.title: 金属竞争加剧，维托尔推出矿山融资基金
item.description: 随着铜和其他金属合约交易商之间的竞争日趋白热化，Vitol 集团和 Breakwall Capital 成立了一个针对美洲矿业公司的信贷基金。【原文：Vitol Group and Breakwall Capital have formed a credit fund targeting mining companies in the Americas, as competition among traders for copper and other metals contracts heats up.】

item.title: 最大对冲基金在混乱的六个月中扩大涨幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税和以色列-伊朗战争引发的全球市场混乱中，最大的对冲基金在 6 月份增加了收益，顺利度过了上半年。【原文：The biggest hedge funds added to their gains in June, sailing through the first half of the year amid global market chaos sparked by President Donald Trump’s tariffs and the Israel-Iran war.】

item.title: 银行股接近创纪录水平，回购和股息增长指日可待
item.description: 美国银行股升至三年来的最高水平，原因是投资者继续涌入银行集团，猜测这些银行在上周轻松通过美联储的压力测试后，将开始增加回购和分红。【原文：US bank stocks rose to their highest level in three years as investors continued to pile into the group amid speculation they will begin to boost buybacks and dividends after the lenders comfortably cleared the Federal Reserve’s stress test last week.】

item.title: 机器人初创公司从美国和中国风险投资公司获得 1.05 亿美元种子资金
item.description: Genesis AI 是一家开发机器人软件的初创公司，它在一轮融资中筹集了 1.05 亿美元，支持者既有美国人也有中国人。【原文：Genesis AI, a startup working on software for robots, has raised $105 million in a funding round with both US and Chinese backers — a rarity in an industry split along geopolitical lines.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所称正在洽谈收购雅典证券交易所事宜
item.description: 泛欧交易所（Euronext NV）表示，它正在洽谈收购雅典股票市场运营商，并称此举将有助于希腊资本市场融入欧元区，并加强其国际发展。【原文：Euronext NV said it is in talks to buy the Athens stock markets operator, a move it says would help integrate Greek capital markets into the Eurozone and increase their international development.】

item.title: 花旗银行认为，如果铜价与其他货币恢复挂钩，赞比亚克瓦查将继续反弹
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）表示，如果赞比亚货币与铜价的相关性得以恢复，赞比亚货币似乎将持续走高。【原文：Zambia’s currency appears set for sustained gains if its correlation with the copper price is restored, Citigroup Inc said.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利称英国债务低迷令高利率效果大打折扣
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，由于英国企业和消费者的债务水平较低，高利率对通货膨胀的影响较小。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said high interest rates are having less of an impact on inflation because of Britain’s low levels of debt among both businesses and consumers.】

item.title: 空中客车公司称 6 月份将交付约 60 架飞机，低于目标值
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，空中客车公司 6 月份交付了约 60 架飞机，这要求这家欧洲飞机制造商在下半年提高产量，以实现全年目标。【原文：Airbus SE delivered about 60 aircraft in June, people familiar with the matter said, requiring the European planemaker to step up output in the second half of the year to achieve its full-year target.】

item.title: 日本央行上田仍需更多信息才能决定下一次加息
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫进一步表示，他将等待更多数据来对下一次货币政策决定做出判断，这表明他并不急于提高借贷成本。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda ramped up his message that he is going to wait for additional data to make a judgment on the next monetary policy decision, signaling that he’s in no rush to raise borrowing costs.】

item.title: 欧洲央行怀疑欧元涨势是否会由祝福变为诅咒
item.description: 欧洲中央银行官员开始担心，欧元的快速升值可能会破坏将通胀率固定在 2% 的努力。【原文：European Central Bank officials are starting to fret that a rapid appreciation of the euro could derail efforts to anchor inflation at 2%.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长 Rhee 称关税对经济增长的打击仍是政策问题
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）表示，韩国央行仍然关注关税对经济扩张而非通胀的影响，并正在判断如何继续降息，同时权衡稳定风险。【原文：The Bank of Korea remains concerned at the tariff impact on economic expansion rather than inflation and is judging how to keep cutting interest rates while weighing stability risks, according to Governor Rhee Chang-yong.】

item.title: 一位方正合伙人因新帕泰克债务交易在德国受审
item.description: 金融咨询公司 One Square Advisors 的一名合伙人是在慕尼黑受审的一群人中的一员，他被控欺诈一家德国纺织公司的债券持有人 100 万欧元（120 万美元）。【原文：A partner of financial advisory firm One Square Advisors is among a group of people standing trial in Munich accused of defrauding bondholders of a German textile company out of €1 million ($1.2 million).】

item.title: 前瑞穗债券交易员因欺骗行为申请解除英国禁令失败
item.description: 前瑞穗国际有限公司（Mizuho International Plc）政府债券交易员三人组被英国金融监管机构指控滥用市场，但他们在挑战金融服务禁令的诉讼中败诉。【原文：A trio of ex-Mizuho International Plc government bond traders accused by the UK’s City watchdog of market abuse lost their bid to challenge their ban from financial services.】

item.title: 电子商务公司 Jumia 吸引了 Axian 的收购兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，非洲最大的电子商务公司 Jumia Technologies AG 已引起电信公司 Axian Telecom 的收购兴趣。【原文：Jumia Technologies AG, the biggest e-commerce company in Africa, has drawn takeover interest from telecommunications company Axian Telecom, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油出货量接近两个月低点
item.description:
较小港口出口量的减少抵消了两个主要码头流量的增加

。【原文：

Lower exports from smaller ports offset increased flows from two key terminals

】

item.title: 监管机构命令瑞士报价减少可疑活动
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构加大了对交易平台 Swissquote Group Holding SA 的压力，要求其采取更多措施遏制可疑活动，因为欺诈和黑客攻击未遂事件激增。【原文：Switzerland’s financial watchdog has stepped up pressure on trading platform Swissquote Group Holding SA to do more to curb suspicious activity amid a surge in attempted fraud and hacks.】
